name: microservice-jwt-sum
description: Microservicio de suma con autenticaci√≥n JWT

scripts.start: concurrently "node src/Auth/authService.js" "node src/Event/eventService.js"  "node src/Inscription/inscriptionService.js" "node src/Programming/programService.js" "node src/Notification/notificationService.js"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run dev:eventService"  "npm run dev:inscriptionService" "npm run dev:programService" "npm run dev:notificationService"
